channel.title: Need help with making grand exchange wait! i think ive got it
channel.description:
hello im starting to make my own 317 g/e and just need to know one thing. i will be releasing the codes for the g/e in a tut but 1st.
How would i be able to get a price from a sepert file. the commands are going to be simular to ::pickup
plz help me :D
Edit***************************************** how do u change the prices of items in regular shops ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 09:04:55 pm[/size][hr]can som1 help me with this
i need to modify the ::pickup command to take away the items shop value help plz!!!
